website_summaries.verdict: For those who seek an affordable and entry-level BlackBerry, the BlackBerry Curve 9350 is the way to go.
pros: The RIM BlackBerry Curve 9350 has a slim and sleek design with a great physical keyboard
It has NFC support and ships with BlackBerry 7 OS
cons: The RIM BlackBerry Curve 9350's side buttons are a little too skinny, there's no HD video capture, and you won't get the latest 4G speeds

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome BB, looks and works like new! Fast delivery, on time. So many options on this phone, more than my other one, I had years ago. We were told on the Sprint 800 line this BB could not be hooked up to a line, so we went to Sprint store ans they were able to hook it up w a line!! Took awhile longer, bc he had to go into phone and finish set up. Works great now:)
customer_reviews.author: sheriann

customer_reviews.title: I was skeptical, but overall... good purchase
customer_reviews.text: I was pretty skeptical from buying this phoneonline on Amazon, however... I'm glad I bought it because now I'm using it like crazy. There are only about 2 cons. 1- no micro usb card. You'll have to buy your own. 2- There's something wrong with my text messages. When people text me, it says that they sent it february 17th 2047 at 8:01pm. Weird. I'm going to get that checked out soon. I think it can be fixed. Overall, good phone for the price. It's no Iphone, but I'll get used to it. I like it so far.
customer_reviews.author: Nana

customer_reviews.title: Great phone, great price.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this phone for my granddaughter who uses it mainly for communications rather than research. I has a great camera and all the features she uses most. She loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Mar

customer_reviews.title: does not work in my country cause it doesnt have sim card slot
customer_reviews.text: this blackberry cannot work in my country because it doesnt have sim card slot... so I need to send it back- Please let me know how is the way to doi it! I saw the phone categorized under unlocked phones and some time ago i got another BB by Amazon and I have no problem so i didnt realize this point... the seller didn't notified this to the buyers, i would like to have the opportunity to exchange it
customer_reviews.author: Claudia G.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Phone is in like new condition works very well also

customer_reviews.title: okay
customer_reviews.text: My expectation where not set very high, so I must say I was pleased with phone. The only thing i did not appreciate is that the charger only worked for one day. It's buyer beware ,so I probaly will buy another device from this person in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Shontell

customer_reviews.title: with a useless fone.
customer_reviews.text: This isnt the fones problem; this is a Blackberry problem. Blackberrys cant be used on Chitchat Mobile. So I am out the money, with a useless fone.
customer_reviews.author: david corless

customer_reviews.title: and a outright lie with "just like new". The product was torn up and scratched ...
customer_reviews.text: Awful product, and a outright lie with "just like new". The product was torn up and scratched beyond repair.

customer_reviews.title: Blackberry Curve 9350 Spring CDMA Phone
customer_reviews.text: Product functions well. Using as a replacement for my previous phone until my contract is up. Good Value. Would recommend.

customer_reviews.title: Not compatible with the Sprint network
customer_reviews.text: I had to return this phone because it was not compatible with the Sprint network even though the phone is labeled as being a Sprint phone.
customer_reviews.author: L. Brooks

customer_reviews.title: phone
customer_reviews.text: i love the phone.. will order again when i need another one.. thank you..love the camera on the phone.. it takes great pictures..

customer_reviews.title: no sim card slot for the phone
customer_reviews.text: I saw the phone categorized under unlocked phones but it has no slot for sim card for the phone I bought

customer_reviews.title: This celular cant be use with sim card
customer_reviews.text: This celular cant be use with sim card, and the seller didn't notified this to the buyers, i would like to have the opportunity to exchange it for the other one
customer_reviews.author: Alfonso

customer_reviews.title: Worth it.
customer_reviews.text: It had some white putty stuff between the keys which I wiped off easily and it was in Spanish. Fortunately I can read a little Spanish so I switched it to English. All in all I think it was new no scratches and fast shipping. The box was banged up but the phone was in excellent condition. It came in a sprint box with a device manual and a charger and some ear buds which I tossed because they were used. Ear wax.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Once you go "Black" you will never go back to anything else
customer_reviews.text: This is my third Blackberry. I have tried others each time my carrier extends me an upgrade, but I find that they are not user friendly. The Curve and the Touch make is so user friendly that I can complete any task seamlessly between applications. This is a straightforward working girl's phone. I feel like a professional adult handling my busy when using this phone. It's a must have.
customer_reviews.author: Annastasia Beaverhousen

customer_reviews.title: It worked well
customer_reviews.text: I will buy from this vender again and I will tell my friends about the service. I will also look for other good buys .
customer_reviews.author: Haywood D. Molette

customer_reviews.text: I could never use the phone. The phones are not unlocked for use in any country

customer_reviews.title: Good out-of-fashion phone.
customer_reviews.text: Appears brand new with all kinds of covers. Good camera. No touch screen but keyboard fells good. The only thing bothers me is that it's way too slow when updating or installing apps.

customer_reviews.title: Its a winner!

product_meta.title: Blackberry Curve 9350 Sprint CDMA Phone with OS 7, 5MP Camera, GPS, Wi-Fi and Bluetooth - Black
product_meta.description: The stylish and sleek, BlackBerry Curve 9350 mobile will truly amaze you with its stunning looks and features. Installed with BlackBerry 7 OS, this BlackBerry smartphone brings access to number of fun applications. This 802.11 b/g/n enabled BlackBerry mobile lets you access high-speed internet connection. Composing emails and texts is now quick and simple with the backlit narrow QWERTY keyboard of this BlackBerry smartphone. Exchange data to-and-fro with this Bluetooth v2.1 enabled BlackBerry mobile . Capture improved quality pictures with the built-in 5 MP, flash camera of the BlackBerry Curve 9350 mobile.
feature_bullets: DEVICE IS CARRIER SPECIFIC AND NOT UNLOCKED!!!
SIM OR MICRO SD CARD NOT INCLUDED!!!

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.4 out of 5 stars33 ratings3.4 out of 5 stars
